attributes.action: Promote England's Petition to be the Hosts of the World Cup 2018
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Football has its roots in the United Kingdom.

In the words of Bill Shankly "Its not a matter of life and death, its more important than that"

Sepp Blatter is dismissing our claims to hold the World Cup. It should go to America or Asia. Football should come home to Britain. 

Sure America or Asia has an argument but none as strong as ours.

Prove that football can come home. Prove that we have the best stadia, the best fans and the best argument to hold the World Cup. 

Vote now or we lose our chance!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
